text:
(Huh? At this hour...
...Is it dance practice...?)

I just happened to pass by on my way back...
But more importantly, it's not safe to be alone here.

Well...
Even I get motivated once in a while, you know.

Look, the lessons are getting tougher
and we're all pushing each other to improve!

...Yeah, I get that you're working hard, Yuika
But I don't want you doing anything risky.

If you need lessons, make sure to adjust your schedule
properly. So, I want you to consult with me first... okay?

...Yeah, sorry for acting on my own
I'll make sure to consult with you properly.

And, thank you...
...for worrying about me.
